reviews.review: ICH KANN JETZT RUSSISCH UND HAB EIN KNIFE GEZOGEN

Released almost a decade ago, it's still a benchmark when it comes to competitive first-person shooters. Although the community is somewhat toxic, following it's relaunch that made it free to play, I'd still recommend everyone to give it a go especially if you have a full party to play with.

Don't be surprised if you develop a love-hate relationship with csgo. It's addictive and fun, but often plagued by desperate try-hards who may not be on the same page with you. If it ever happens to you (which it will), I'd suggest taking a break from it for a few days, playing something else and then coming back just to suck even more and potentially smashing your keyboard in the process. But don't worry, "it's only a game." :)
You'll soon find out that there are many technical aspects to winning a match, it's more than just aim & shoot. You'll need to memorise the ways to control gun recoil, smoke grenade projectiles and the art of not getting carried.


Pro tip :-
Please Gabe regularly and the Gods of Ranking just might smile upon you.
So, Skins > Skills (Don't say I never warned you)
